WorkItem.Description:
Hi, there exists an annoying incompatibility when making from models to llbl entities. The issue pops up when you are mapping *TO* an entity (not from an entity). If you are trying to map values to a property on the entity that is of type EntityCollection<T> (which is an LLBL collection class used to contain, in this case, related entities). It tries to clear the collections (its calls Clear()) list source... 
 
to be honest its been a year since I came up with the work around and I am a bit hazy on the details now but it's described in detail here: http://llblgen.com/TinyForum/Messages.aspx?ThreadID=17504
 
It seems to stem from the fact that EntityCollection doesn't implement IList, it implement IListSource.
WorkItem.Summary: AutoMapper not playing nice with LLBLGen
